title: Kinetic Theory - Pressure on sides of container

content.question: A closed cylindrical container is filled with a monatomic ideal gas at room temperature. The area of the circular top surface of the container is <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math> and the area of the cylindrical side of the container is <math alttext="2 A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi></math>, as indicated in the figure. Which of the following statements about the pressure exerted by the gas on the top and side of the container is correct?

choices.label: The gas exerts zero pressure on the top and side.
The gas exerts the same nonzero pressure on the top and the side.
The gas exerts a greater pressure on the top than on the side.
The gas exerts a greater pressure on the side than on the top.

content.answer: The gas exerts the same nonzero pressure on the top and the side.
